Jiney's Gelato began in 2007 as the passion project of two Brothers Benny and Jack with the simple idea of bringing great gelato to the South.

Beginning as a food truck, Jiney's Gelato has always been as rich, creamy and smooth as it is innovative. Serving up scoops, pints, gelato sandwiches and milk-shakes in flavors inspired by its Southern roots, Jiney's Gelato offers flavors such as Brown Butter Crunch, Lemon Raspberry Crumble and Bourbon Pecan Praline!
